meanings.definition: The radiant energy per unit area at a given point.
meanings.sent1: The irradiance of the sun on a clear day is very strong.
meanings.sent2: The room was filled with a warm irradiance from the glowing lamp.
meanings.sent3: The cat basked in the gentle irradiance of the afternoon sun.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had an irradiance that lit up the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The garden was bathed in the golden irradiance of the setting sun.

meanings.definition: The act of illuminating or shining upon.
meanings.sent1: The streetlights provided a comforting irradiance on the dark road.
meanings.sent2: The stage was bathed in a bright irradiance during the performance.
meanings.sent3: The disco ball cast an amusing irradiance on the dance floor.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room with an irradiance that lifted everyone's spirits.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks painted the night sky with colorful irradiance.
